mapper.insert: INSERT INTO [userQueryCond] ( userId , ticketId , serial , queryName , queryCond ) VALUES ( #{userId} , #{ticketId} , #{serial} , #{queryName} , #{queryCond} )
mapper.delete: DELETE [userQueryCond] WHERE userId= #{userId} and ticketId= #{ticketId} and serial= #{serial}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM [userQueryCond] WHERE userId= #{userId} and ticketId= #{ticketId}
